data.name: Moon Caves Demo
data.detailed_description:
This is a rogue-like top-down shooter where you control a spaceship that is sent out to explore the caves on the Moon. But once you enter the caves, you find out that they are inhabited by hostile forces. It is up to you to survive against them while also trying to find the path down to the next level of the caves.

Features:


  • Randomly generated levels,
  • Custom character designs,
  • Achievements,
  • Subtitles,
  • Twitch integration,
  • Speedrun support,

data.short_description: This is a rogue-like top-down shooter where you control a spaceship that is sent out to explore the caves on the Moon. Once you enter the caves, you find out that there are enemies. It is up to you to survive against them while also trying to find the path down to the next level of the caves.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows
  • Memory: 115 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) UDH Graphics 630
  • Storage: 79 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-8750H CPU @ 2.20GHz
  • Memory: 120 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDA GeForce GTX 1060
  • Storage: 80 MB available space
